title: My First Blog Post!
author: Ethan
content: This is my first ever blog post! I am so excited to share this with the world!

title: The Final Blog Post
author: Maverick
content: I am Maverick and I am a dog who is typing on this blog. Its like that really unfunny Disney show. I hope who ever thought of that got fired.
